conditions.rails:
All chase bends out by 5yds from innermost position.
Hurdle Bends out between 5yds and 8yds.
2nd Hurdle in back straight moved back to provide the best ground.
conditions.weatherComment:
Dry last week. 5mm Saturday night into Sunday. 12mm Monday. 4mm Tuesday.

data.going: ABANDONED - Gales (Day of Racing) Racing Abandoned. Wind speeds have reached unacceptable mph gusts this morning and our localised forecast predict this to continue for the remainder of today, affecting our racing operation, public safety and grandstand areas. We are working closely with the BHA to explore options for restaging races.
data.weather: We are monitoring the Amber storm Ciara weather warning: It remains the case that strong wind gusts are forecast from the early hours of Sunday. Heavy rain arrives Saturday evening through to Sunday evening. Largely dry overcast this week. 2mm late Friday evening.

data.going: ABANDONED - Waterlogged (Day Before) Waterlogged - abandoned after 36mm in 12 hours, Rainfall set to continue. Multiple wings are also damaged beyond repair due to the high winds Saturday afternoon.
data.weather: 28mm since Sunday morning. 20mm Wednesday, dry overnight. Dry Friday morning and most of the day, showers start this evening. Outlook unsettled rain set to continue from Friday, with strong gusts expected. We will continue to update as our situation evolves during the amber warning of rain.

Fresh Hurdle positions. All centred to the outer by 4 pads width home straight and 3 pads width back straight, from innermostposition.
